1487060.name: Locksmith Simulator
1487060.description:
In Locksmith Simulator you get to become the handy-man everyone turns to with their epic day-to-day challenges. Find a way to open various casing, chests, safes and complex car locks.



Use your wits and find the best tool for each job. Use your gear to solve seemingly tough situations. These will include trapped pets, locked treasures, massive gates that need repair and busted security locks that you’ll need opened or fixed to help out your clients.



Expand your workshop by buying additional equipment and gear which will allow you to perform more heroic deeds such as fixing broken tools, assembling a safe, producing fool-proof locks and keys, installing gates and doors and fitting new locks where they belong.



Unlock Steam Achievements and become the best Locksmith in town!
1487060.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
